dt-button.name: searchPanes
dt-button.summary: A single button that displays the SearchPanes container in a popover.
dt-button.description: This button type creates a popover that contains the SearchPanes container. This allows SearchPanes to be used without it taking up extra space in the dom.
dt-button.option: This option allows for SearchPanes to be configured as it would in a normal initialisation. All of the `searchPanes.*` options can be configured within this object.
This options allows the text within the button to be configured. This can also be configured with the `searchPanes.collapse` option of the DataTables `-init language` option.
For the SearchPanes button the init function sets up SearchPanes so that it is ready to be used immediately when the user presses the button.
The action function for the SearchPanes button displays the SearchPanes container to the user in a popover.
